text: Pas jab in kafiron se tumhari muth-bhaid (battle) ho to pehla kaam gardanein (necks) maarna hai, yahan tak ke jab tum unko acchi tarah kuchal do tab qaidiyon (captives) ko mazboot baandho. Iske baad (tumhein ikhtiyar hai) ehsan karo ya fidiye (ransom) ka muaamla karlo, taa-aanke ladayi apne hatiyar daal de. Yeh hai tumhare karne ka kaam. Allah chahta to khud hi unse nimat leta, magar (yeh tareeqa us ne is liye ikhtiyar kiya hai) taa-ke tum logon ko ek dusre ke zariye se aazmaye aur jo log Allah ki raah mein maarey jayenge Allah unke aamal ko hargiz zaya na karega
